data

Class Car

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.Car
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Agent

    public class Car
extends java.lang.Object
implements Agent
    A car remembers its position from the beginning of its road. Cars have random velocity and random movement pattern: when reaching the end of a road, the dot either resets its position to the beginning of the road, or reverses its direction.
